About The App

Indian Logistics Network is an application built for the road transport industry wherein one can identify reliability-rated transporters pan-India. Most of India’s highly fragmented road transport industry still use cumbersome and multi-format physical directories to find and locate transporters through a number of brokers and middlemen. Eliminating this particular inefficiency, TripIn Directory integrates exhaustive transport directory listings with a powerful tag-based search function.


Great Features You‘ll Love it.

This is a very useful directory app for both truck owner and fleet owners as well as shippers and logistics companies. The truck owner can create a company and add all the information related to there company like company name, address, phone and trucks information into the app, allowing shippers to find the truck owner on simply searching by route, by name and/or by city. This would enable the shipper to contact the truck owner directly, resulting in cost savings and better business at both ends of the transaction.

Add your company information

Add your business to the ILN transport directory to increase sales.

Search

Search a transporter for your business by Route, Transporter Name, and/or City.

Voice Search

No need to type. Just speak your search request and find relevant results.

Verified Listing

Every Transporter/Agent/Logistics Company on ILN is duly verified.

FLEET

Enable customers to view your entire inventory of trucks by adding multiple trucks to your fleet.

SHARE INFO

Easily store and share your truck and driver info with all the relevant stakeholders.

Invite

Invite your friends/family/colleagues to download and register on ILN to expand your network.
